title: Who Needs Wind Tunnels? Lidl-Trek Has an on-Bike Aero Optimization Tool for ‘Marginal but Crucial Gains’
content:
Lidl-Trek partners F1 whizzkids Aerosensor to record aerodynamic data on the road: Will it be a game changer or half-percenter?

Read the full article at Who Needs Wind Tunnels? Lidl-Trek Has an on-Bike Aero Optimization Tool for ‘Marginal but Crucial Gains’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
